words.sentence: Ik heb zakken in mijn tas.
words.sentence_translated: I have bags in my bag.

words.sentence: Hij is hoogopgeleid en werkt in een wereldje.
words.sentence_translated: He is highly educated and works in a world.
I have to wait this hour out.

words.sentence: Zet de tas neer, het is zwaar.
words.sentence_translated: Put the bag down, it's heavy.

words.sentence: De top van de tas is blank.
words.sentence_translated: The top of the bag is white.

words.sentence: De rest van de zakken moet ik halen.
words.sentence_translated: I have to pick up the remainder of the bags.
